author: Nastya Bobkova
title: Infinix introduces Zero Series Mini Tri-Fold smartphone - a revolution in mobile technology
text:
Infinix has presented a prototype of the Zero Series Mini Tri-Fold smartphone, which can be folded in three parts at once. The company believes that the device will be able to replace not only a regular smartphone but also a smartwatch and an action camera.
Here's What We Know Zero Series Mini Tri-Fold can change shape depending on the user's needs. Its screen supports three different configurations:
Compact mode - the device takes up minimal space when folded. Expanded mode - the screen expands to provide more space for viewing content or working with applications. Tent mode - allows you to position your smartphone so that each side is used for separate tasks, for example, to communicate in different languages through the integrated translator.
Zero Series Mini Tri-Fold. Illustration: Infinix Infinix claims that the Zero Series Mini Tri-Fold can double as a fitness tracker and action camera. Thanks to special accessories, it can be attached to a bike or backpack, using the built-in cameras to record video on the move.
